page.title: 15Occupations in Kirtlington
page.content:
We carried out a survey that was completed by 61% of people living in the village. The most common areas of employment followed by adults were: Clerical 12.2% Sales 4.8% Education 10.5% Finance 4.4% Industry 7.8% Building 4.1% Agriculture 7.1% Transport 3.7% Services 5.8% Law 1.7% Medicine 5.8%
We asked how far people travel to work with the following results: 0- 5 miles 22% 5-10 miles 38% 10-25 miles 31% 25-50 miles 4% more than 50 miles 5%
We were surprised that people travel more than 50 miles to work but we believe that they may travel even further when the M40 Motorway from Oxford to Birmingham is built nearby.
